dct_alternative_sm: Pedemontanae totius prope Italiae fertilissimae regionis una cum suis finitimis elegantissimo descriptio
dct_description_sm: Ioannes a Deutecum, Lucas a Deutecum, fecerunt.
From De Jode's Speculum orbis terrarum, Antwerp, first published in 1578, reissued by Cornelis in 1593.
